title: Need help
body: I need help, nomatter What i Do im just Stuck at Bronze 1, if i dont go by the Meta i lose if i go by the Meta i still lose, i myself know im not a good Player But im also not Bad to be into Bronze,i Too make some mistakes. the biggest Problem, is that my teams just suck 75-85% of the time nomatter What i Do. I Cant carry a game alone But atleast i can help carry.

replies.body: I added you. I can share  personal experience with you :)
